short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI powered cross-database literature search and reference manager

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fast and customisable way to manage all your searches across major databases. Users can seamlessly synchronise and manage references on the user portal where our 'research question' friendly algorithms will efficiently rerank references according users' research needs.
